document.full_text: indian police arrested the former chief organizer of the delhi commonwealth games on monday as part of a crackdown on corruption, embarrassing the government as it fights major state polls.
document.title: india arrests ex-games chief as telecoms case widens
lines_and_colors: indian police arrested the former chief organizer of the delhi commonwealth games on monday as part of a crackdown on corruption, embarrassing the government as it fights major state polls.
